sentences: Lindude jooksmed on v채ga 천hukesed ja habrasad.
Selle linnu jooksmed on eriti pikad ja peenikesed.
Jooksetel v천ivad olla erinevad v채rvid ja mustriid.
translation: lower part of a bird's leg
context: In Estonian, 'jookse' refers to the tarsus or lower part of a bird's leg located between the heel and toes. It is a zoological term specifically used in ornithology to describe this anatomical feature of birds.
